groups.description: A collection of documentation groups for this project.

docsIds.description: A list of unique IDs for types associated with this documentation group. The docs ID defaults to the type's name, but it can be overwritten with the @docsId JSDoc tag.

primaryDocsId.description: The primary type for this documentation group. This is usually a component module, but it can also be a service when a module isn't required to implement it (e.g. SkyFlyoutService).
